name: tm64
effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Explosion to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.platinum: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user explodes to inflict damage on all Pokémon in battle. The user faints upon using this move.
